panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: logging Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{type="logging"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{type="logging"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="logging"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{type="logging"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="logging"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{type="logging"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="logging"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{type="logging"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="logging"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: logging Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.description: Saturation is a measure of what ratio of a finite resource is currently being utilized. Lower is better.

panels.title: elasticsearch_searching SLI Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_1h{component="elasticsearch_searching",type="logging"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_5m{component="elasticsearch_searching",type="logging"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="elasticsearch_searching",monitor="global",type="logging"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_1h{component="elasticsearch_searching",type="logging"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="elasticsearch_searching",monitor="global",type="logging"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_30m{component="elasticsearch_searching",type="logging"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="elasticsearch_searching",monitor="global",type="logging"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_6h{component="elasticsearch_searching",type="logging"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="elasticsearch_searching",monitor="global",type="logging"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

panels.content:
### Description

Opensearch global search average rate.
panels.title: Details

panels.description:
Average CPU utilization.

This resource measures the CPU utilization for the selected cluster or domain. If it is becoming saturated, it may indicate that the fleet needs horizontal or
vertical scaling. The metrics are coming from cloudwatch_exporter.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(type) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      avg_over_time(aws_es_cpuutilization_average[1m])/100
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: opensearch_cpu component saturation: Average CPU Utilization for Opensearch

panels.description:
Disk utilization for Opensearch
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(type) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      aws_es_cluster_used_space_average/(aws_es_free_storage_space_average+aws_es_cluster_used_space_average)
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: opensearch_disk_space component saturation: Disk Utilization Overall
